sections.heading: Visitors Promotion Fund; collection; administrative fee
sections.text: The amount the Tax Commissioner shall remit, as taxes collected for a County Visitors Promotion Fund, shall be reduced by three percent as an administrative fee necessary to defray the cost of collecting the tax and the expenses incident to suc

81-3723.County Visitors Promotion Fund; collection; administrative fee.

The amount the Tax Commissioner shall remit, as taxes collected for a County Visitors Promotion Fund, shall be reduced by three percent as an administrative fee necessary to defray the cost of collecting the tax and the expenses incident to such collection.

SourceLaws 1980, LB 499, ยง 17;R.S.1943, (2008), ยง 81-1261;Laws 2012, LB1053, ยง 23.
